description:
Master Excel for iPad through quick, easy video tutorials designed just for iPad users! In just 90 minutes, Excel for iPad will teach you all the core skills you need to be productive with Excel for your iPad tablet, and collaborate with any Excel user, anywhere! Top Excel expert and Microsoft MVP Zack Barrese walks you through creating, opening, editing, and saving workbooks… using OneDrive to access your workbooks anywhere… sharing workbooks with Excel users on desktops, tablets, or Office 365… sorting, filtering, and validating your data… building reliable formulas and inserting attractive, intuitive charts… even creating powerful PivotTables for analysis.

Lesson 1: Getting Excel for iPad

Lesson 2: Getting started in Excel for iPad

Lesson 3: Getting around the app

Lesson 4: Using and editing formulas

Lesson 5: Sorting and filtering data

Lesson 6: Charting in Excel for iPad

Lesson 7: Working with shapes

Lesson 8: Sharing and sending your data

Lesson 9: Using and editing PivotTables

Lesson 10: Using coloring and validation features

About the Instructor:

Zack Barresse is a long-standing Microsoft Excel MVP who has contributed to online help forums for over a decade. His Excel-related roles have included author, trainer, consultant, template builder for Microsoft, and developer.
title: Excel for iPad
